articles.title: Press Report of WPK Central Committee on Conclusion of 200-day Campaign
articles.content:
Press Report of WPK Central Committee on Conclusion of 200-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) made public a press report Sunday on the victorious conclusion of the 200-day campaign on Dec. 15 after it was started on June 1.
					 The 200-day campaign was an all-people drive for successive attack and a breakthrough for defending the spirit of the 7th Congress of the WPK and glorifying 2016 as the greatest heyday of the revolution by expanding and developing the victory won in the 70-day campaign, and a great battle for creation of the self-development-first spirit and the great battle for creation of speed of Mallima, the press report said.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks, mainstay of the Juche revolution, has been consolidated as firm as a rock. This is the biggest victory won in the 200-day campaign.
					
					 The heroic officers and men of the People's Army set an excellent example of devotedly carrying forward the instructions of the leaders on the foremost fronts and kindled the flame of implementing the party's idea and defending party's lines all over the country by holding fast to the treasured sword of defending the revolution and the people, and thus fulfilled their duty as the army of the revolutionary party in consolidating the great army-people unity.
					
					 The young Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist vanguard displayed resourcefulness and bravery of heroic youths in all difficult and toilsome worksites.
					
					 The heroic Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist working class, agricultural workers, intellectuals and women displayed the spiritual and moral traits of helping and leading each other forward with kindred feelings while upholding the party and the leader with white gem-like loyalty and increased production.
					
					 A miraculous victory of converting misfortune into favorable conditions was won on the front of recovering from the damage in the northern parts of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces intensified training the way anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu, getting themselves fully ready for combat for blowing up the bases of aggression and provocation in all operational theatres and defending the security of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The people in the defence industry achieved successive victories in nuclear warhead explosion test and development of Korean-style ultra-modern strategic weapons.
					
					 In the industrial field the goal of total output value of the 200-day campaign was over-fulfilled at 119 percent and thousands of industrial establishments over-fulfilled their yearly plan for national economy ahead of schedule.
					
					 In the field of science and technology 250KW wind power generator was developed for the first time in the country and the technology for the production of electrode for UHP electric arc furnace was completed and many other scientific and technological problems were settled and preparations were pushed forward for building ultra-modern technical industry.
					
					 Production of electricity and coal was put on a high normal footing, more achievements were registered in metal industry and railway transport and basic industrial fields including machine, chemistry and building materials industries brought about a surge in production.
					
					 Unusual success was registered in the crop production in the fields of agriculture, fruit farming and fishery and great harvest of fruits and spectacular scenery of a good catch of fish were presented.
					
					 A number of indigenous raw and other materials and equipment were developed and produced and Korean-style modernization was powerfully pushed forward and light industrial goods with Korean trademark were churned out. 
					
					 Socialist fairy streets and villages mushroomed in the northern tip of the country along the River Tuman and the first-phase construction of Honggon Islet tideland, the first-phase construction of waterway in South Hwanghae Province, Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, Medical Oxygen Factory and other monumental edifices of Mallima era were completed and the construction of Ryomyong Street was pushed forward at a great speed.
					
					 A lot of factories and enterprises witnessed the production of a great number of those who fulfilled plans for two years and three years and pacesetters of Mallima spirit and also the practice of heroic deeds.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University and more than 110 universities across the country put teaching on pragmatic, integrated and modern basis and put classrooms and experiment and practice rooms on a multi-functional basis, and progress was made in enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education system and scientific and technological dissemination bases were arranged in a great number of factories, enterprises and co-op farms.
					
					 Woman footballers raised two World Cups one after another and literature and art pieces of high ideological value and artistry were created, notably song "Advancing Socialism", lengthy novel "Field Train" among the cycle of novels "Immortal Guidance", music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" and feature film "Story of My Family".
					
					 The press report stressed that the general goal of the 200-day campaign was attained and, thereby, a firm ground was laid for attaining the goal of the five-year strategy for national economic development.

articles.title: State Commendations Conferred upon Persons of Merit
articles.content:
State Commendations Conferred upon Persons of Merit
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- State commendations were conferred on the working people, service personnel and officials who made great contributions to glorifying this year as the greatest heyday of the revolution and demonstrating the dignity and might of the country.  
					 Order of Kim Il Sung was conferred on Jo Pyong Sik, Order of Kim Jong Il on Ri Thaek Ho, the title of Labor Hero of the DPRK and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class on Kang Yong Sok, Jong Il Chol, Jong Chang Su, Pak Kyong, Yun Jae Hyok, Kang Pyong Nam, Ri Chun Gyu and Ra Jong Chol, watches bearing the august name of Kim Il Sung on Choe Kil Yong and Pak Kyong Il, watches bearing the august name of Kim Jong Il on Kim Jong Hyang and Kim Hwa Sik, citation of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Choe Sung Do, Jong Sun Chol, Kye Sung Jin, Kim Su Hyok, Mun Song Sil, Jo Yong Sam, Kim Yun Chol, Jong Ok Im, Kang Won Hui, Pak Yong Baek, Ri Sung Uk, Kim Hak Won, Ji Jong Ho, Kim Tae Song, Jo Hui Chol, Ju Kwang Sik, Song In Chol, Han Mun Song and Ri Su Il, citation of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on Kim Ki Su and Pong Won, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize on Kim Kum Song and Kim Jong Il Youth Ho
					
					 nor Priz
					
					 e on Kim Song Guk, Kim Jong Ok and Jo Un Suk.
					
					 The title of People's Athlete went to Rim Jong Sim and titles of honor went to many persons of merit.
					
					 Order of National Flag First Class was conferred on Ri Won Myong and 78 others.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae and officials in the army and society, service personnel and working people who performed distinguished feats in the building of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Best Footballers for 2016 Selected in DPRK
articles.content:
Best Footballers for 2016 Selected in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the DPRK Football Association made public the list of best footballers of the country for Juche 105(2016).
					 They are Ri Myong Guk of the Pyongyang Sports Team, Ri Hae Yon of the April 25 Sports Team and Kim So Hyang of the Sobaeksu Sports Team.
					
					 Ri Myong Guk played a great role for the DPRK teams to take the first place in the second-round preliminaries for the EAFF E-1 Football Championship 2017 to be qualified for the championship. And he was the best footballer for 2014 and 2015.
					
					 Ri Hae Yon was awarded Silver Boot by scoring six goals in the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup and Kim So Hyang Silver Ball by scoring 4 goals in 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

articles.title: Inaugural Ceremony of First-stage Waterway in South Hwanghae Province Held
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremony of First-stage Waterway in South Hwanghae Province Held
 Haeju, December 19 (KCNA) -- The first-stage gravitational waterway project in South Hwanghae Province was completed in the DPRK. 
					 The completion of the waterway project in the western part of the country opened up a bright prospect for increasing the grain production free from drought in the fields of Haeju, Pyoksong, Ongjin and Kangryong areas. 
					
					 The inaugural ceremony of the waterway took place on the spot on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Kwak Pom Gi and officials concerned and builders who took part in the first-stage project and officials and working people in the province. 
					
					 A congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was conveyed to the builders who completed the first-stage waterway project in South Hwanghae Province and their helpers.

articles.title: Calendars and Greeting Cards for New Year Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Calendars and Greeting Cards for New Year Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Publishing House of the DPRK issued three kinds of calendars and four kinds of greeting cards for the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 According to Choe Tong Min, director of a department of the publishing house, beautiful natural sceneries of the country, national cultural heritages and ceramic wares are printed in those calendars.
					
					 Seen in a greeting card are two pigeons flying around the Korean map and in another is the winter scenery of the Hyonmu Gate.

articles.title: National Landscapes and Handcrafts Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Landscapes and Handcrafts Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A national landscapes and handcrafts exhibition opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture Monday to observe the 99th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the center of the exhibition hall are photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, acryl painting "Wishes of All Peoples" and oil painting "Personally Standing on Sentry Duty"depicting Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 On display there are more than 140 art works including Korean paintings, oil paintings, embroideries and handcrafts produced by artists in various parts of the country.
					
					 The art works deal with the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk and the exploits she performed by setting an example in devotedly protecting the leader and opening up a rosy future for the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Some art works remind visitors of the giant footprints left by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu across the country.
					
					 Displayed there are art works depicting the reality in the DPRK making leaping advance under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and ceramic, metal and horn works. 
					
					 Officials in the field of culture and arts, art lovers, working people and university students in the city visited the exhibition that day.
					
					 The exhibition will run till Dec. 30.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo left here on Monday.

articles.title: Thongchon Fishery Station Makes Good Hauls
articles.content:
Thongchon Fishery Station Makes Good Hauls
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Fishery stations in the east coastal area of the DPRK are making good hauls through fishing campaign started from early November.
					 One of them is the Thongchon Fishery Station which netted 1.8 times more fish year-on-year in November and early December this year. The station is now catching scores of tons of fish on a daily basis in recent days.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Yong Jin, manager of the station, told KCNA:
					
					 The station has correctly commanded ships in this fishing campaign. All ships are well equipped with fishing tackles like gill-net and wall-net and communication means to raise fishing efficiency.
					
					 And the improvement of lighting apparatuses and winch capacity makes it possible to double the amount of catch per netting and ship.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly elder statesman who paved a broad avenue to the country's prosperity by setting an epochal example in creation and changes with his gifted wisdom and through bold practice, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The history of his revolutionary activities is a history of unheard-of eye-opening creation and innovations.
					
					 The course covered by the peerlessly great man was that in which he ushered in a heyday in all fields of the revolution and construction with his great patriotic pride and in the spirit of a pioneer and turned misfortune into blessing through the grand advance for continued innovations. His whole life was characterized by unprecedentedly tremendous creations through which he brought about great events that others could never venture, turning everything into an icon one in the present world, not merely transforming an old thing into a new one.
					
					 By foiling the harshest and basest sanctions and pressure by the reactionary imperialists hostile to the DPRK through the strong wind of epoch-making creation and speed campaign, he ushered in an era of uninterrupted surge. This is a historic miracle that can be performed by him only.
					
					 The undying exploits he performed by laying an eternal foundation for building the greatest power for the people in the world will shine forever along with the history of the nation.

articles.title: 8th All-People Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
8th All-People Action Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The 8th all-people action was reportedly staged in over 80 parts of south Korea simultaneously on Dec. 17, under the sponsorship of the People's Emergency Action to Bring down the Park Geun Hye regime.
					 At least 770,000 people of all social standings took part in the action.
					
					 In Seoul, hundreds of thousands of people conducted various actions for the immediate resignation of the Park group before holding candlelight rally.
					
					 In Kwangju, more than 30,000 citizens held a candlelight rally, chanting such slogans as "President, step down at once," "Hwang Kyo An is as guilty as Park Geun Hye" and "Punish Hwang".
					
					 In the meantime, similar candlelight actions were in North Kyongsang Province, South Chungchong Province and all other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Cooking up Spy Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Cooking up Spy Case
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience under the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea sponsored a Thursday meeting at Thapgol Park in Seoul on Dec. 15, in denunciation of the puppet regime's plotting a spy case, according to an online newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the meeting, Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association, noted that the Seoul Central District Court on the same day sentenced a four- year-prison term on priest Kim Song Yun, claiming he manipulated the November 14 all-out people's action last year on someone's "order".
					
					 He contended that, if the regime ensures such basic human rights as freedom of political belief, it will have to release Kim Song Un at once and instead take Park Geun Hye into custody.
					
					 Kim's wife said that the Intelligence Service and the police cracked down on her husband, linking him to the north, for fear that the religious movement may develop on to a new level along with citizens' actions for peace.
					
					 She denounced this crackdown as a clear act of framing up a spy case.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Labor Policy Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Labor Policy Criticized in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea on Dec. 15 and 16 criticized Park Geun Hye's unpopular labor policy.
					 Referring to the "government's" economic policies of the past four years, it pointed out that Park ruthlessly broke the commitments related to the economy she made before the people.
					
					 Park promised that the rate of latent growth would increase by 4 percent and the hiring rate would reach 70 percent in three years, but her regime has been engaged in total war with the working circle, it condemned.
					
					 It said that the unemployment rate in south Korea went up considerably during her office of four years.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Flailed for Treachery
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Flailed for Treachery 
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- After the passing of the impeachment motion through the "National Assembly", traitor Hwang Kyo An of south Korea went busy convening a "temporary state council meeting" and security meeting, crying out for "administering state affairs" without a hitch. In his "talk to people" he vociferated about "close cooperation with the international community" to "cope with the nuclear issue of the north".
					 Meanwhile, puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se blustered that "there was no change in foreign policy including keynote of the policy for pressurizing the north". And the gentry of the puppet Ministry of Unification made public a document clarifying the stand on "adhering to the north policy" and "invariably pursuing it."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 These are acts of treachery going against the trend of the times and the aspiration of the people.
					
					 The puppet conservative group of south Korea is making desperate efforts to the last moments of its existence but they are in vain.
					
					 Its persistent pursuance of the confrontation policy toward the fellow countrymen will only give further momentum to the people's anti-regime struggle. It is proved by the fact that the people's emergency action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime calls for the resignation of Hwang.
					
					 The conservative forces can never escape the same miserable fate as that of traitor Park Geun Hye as they are persisting in the country-selling policies punished by history.

articles.title: Detention of Park and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Detention of Park and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations in south Korea including workers, religionists and artistes held an "evening of solidarity" in Seoul on Dec. 15, in demand of detention of Park Geun Hye and release of the prisoners of conscience, according to the online newspaper Voice of People.
					 The participants said that sentencing the chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions to a heavy penalty on the charge of spearheading an all-out people's action is an unreasonable crackdown and absurd action.
					
					 They held that the judicial authorities brandishing bayonets to hurt guiltless people should clearly know the fact that the people are the master of this land and immediately detain Park and set free the prisoners of conscience.
					
					 Then, they conducted information activities calling for an end to the scandals of the Park regime.

articles.title: Illegal Acts of Park Geun Hye Group Denounced
articles.content:
Illegal Acts of Park Geun Hye Group Denounced
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Democratic Party of south Korea at a meeting of the "National Assembly" denounced the illegal acts of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors on Dec. 16, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 She said if it is true that Chongwadae kept a watch on the president of the Supreme Court, it was a serious illegal act for which Park Geun Hye should be impeached several times.
					
					 In particular, the former director of Segye Ilbo proved that he was displaced from his office and his personal safety was threatened after reporting a document related to Jong Yun Hoe and this brought to light the regime's control over press and violation of freedom of press, she added.
					
					 She urged the special investigation team to fully discover the true colors of the evil regime and sternly punish the person responsible.
					
					 The floor leader of the Minju Party said that Jong Yun Hoe "assisted the president" though he had no job at Chongwadae.
					
					 The core of the document related to Jong Yun Hoe is that he administered "state affairs", the floor leader said.
					
					 During a hearing Jong was pulled up over the bribe of 700 million-won.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A memorial service of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday, the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Placed before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il were floral baskets reflecting boundless loyalty of the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other compatriots.
					
					 The platform of the event was taken by Chairman Ho Jong Man, Vice-Chairmen Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and other Koreans and representatives of students of Korean University and Korean high schools.
					
					 The participants in the service paid silent tribute to the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his memorial address that the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il was that of a great statesman who ushered in the new era of the Juche revolution, the era in which the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung is being carried forward in all fields, cherishing absolute loyalty to him.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il took warm care of Koreans in Japan, calling them members of the same family and showed all sorts of love for them,  saying that there is nothing to spare for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, he went on:
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have turned out to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il, with the firm faith that he is always alive thanks to the distinguished leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pledge-taking speeches were made by Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the women's union; Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon; Jang Pyong Thae, rector of Korean University; and Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan. 
					
					 Similar memorial services took place in Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Aichi, Ibaragi, Hiroshima, Fukuoka, Hokkaido and other prefectural headquarters of Chongryon on the same day.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday, the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at its venue were photos showing the greatness of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among its visitors were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, its vice-chairpersons, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors and members of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, senior officials of organizations and businesses and chairpersons of headquarters of Chongryon in Kanto.
					
					 Looking at the photos, they recollected the life of patriotic dedication of Kim Jong Il who had made high-intensity forced march through snowstorm and cold rain in his simple padded clothes till the last day of his great life.
					
					 They also looked round with deep emotion the photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un who is implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il on the highest level through forced march of selfless dedication to the people, creditably carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Lecture Given by Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Lecture Given by Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) gave a lecture at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, its vice-chairpersons, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors and department directors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairmen and officials of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto region, compatriots of different social standings and students of Korean University and Korean high schools.
					
					 The participants watched a video of lecture "Great Guardian of the Country and Nation".
					
					 The lecture helped them look back on the devoted efforts of Kim Jong Il who led the arduous Songun revolution despite snow and rain with the steadfast faith and will to protect with arms the destiny of the country and the nation which President Kim Il Sung left in the last decade of the 20th century when the country faced the most grave situation.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Demand Punishment of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Demand Punishment of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Dec. 5 made public a statement titled "Park Geun Hye going against the public mindset should be brought to justice as soon as possible."
					 The statement said that "talk to people" made by Park in south Korea is a crafty charade aimed to prolong her remaining days by placating the angry people even a bit, now that she finds herself in an awful fix.
					
					 It contended that Park should be brought down by the scruff and thrown into the dustbin of history as she is leaving no stones unturned to refuse the people's demands.

articles.title: Personages of Different Countries Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Personages of Different Countries Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of governments, political parties and organizations and institutions in different countries visited the DPRK missions in the period from Dec. 9 to 17 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They placed floral baskets, bouquets and flowers at the pictures of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The visitors included a vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the secretary of the Khabarovsk Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party, the vice-minister of International and Interregional Cooperation of Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia, the acting representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Khabarovsk, the first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chief of the Khabarovsk Territorial Branch of the A Just Russia, the director for External Relations of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the director of the Central Secretariat of the Pakistan People's Party, and personages of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party of China, the Central Military Commission of China, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China, the China Association for International Frien
					
					 dly Cont
					
					 act, the Communist Youth League of China, the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, the China－Korea Friendship Association, the All－China Federation of Trade Unions, the All－China Women's Federation, the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the International Taekwon-Do Association, the Presidency of Uganda, the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan－African Movement and the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The director for External Relations of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle praised the feats performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the friendly relations between the two parties and the two countries.
					
					 Meanwhile, the C.C., Communist Party of China and the Chinese Embassy in Pyongyang sent floral baskets to the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea on Dec. 16 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on the 5th anniversary of his demise took place at the DPRK Embassy in Moscow on Dec. 16.
					 The participants in the meeting laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Then they looked round the photos displayed on the subject of "The great Comrade Kim Jong Il will live forever."
					
					 They paid a silent tribute in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Several personages made speeches at the meeting which began with the playing of immortal classic "Where Are You, Dear General?" by artistes of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia.
					
					 They praised the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man and his great feats performed for the development of the bilateral friendly relations, recalling the days when they had honor of being received by him.
					
					 Attending the meeting were personages of the State Duma, political parties, the government, institutions and public organizations of Russia, including: Kobzon, deputy to the State Duma who is the first vice-chairman of the Cultural Committee of the State Duma, Taysaev, secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is chief of the Russian-Korean Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, Churov, roving ambassador at the Foreign Ministry, Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the newspaper Zavtra who is a winner of International Kim Il Sung Prize, and other figures of the Party for Peace and Unity, the Foreign Ministry, the Orchestra of the 21st Century, the Academy of Sciences, the Izborsk Club, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and his embassy officials were present at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Party of Communists of Russia, the Committee of the Republic of Buryatia of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in a period from Dec. 7 to 12.
					 Kim Jong Il consolidated the DPRK into an invincible socialist bulwark with his distinguished leadership and devoted his all to the people's happiness, regarding it as his lifelong motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, the chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said, adding:
					
					 He conducted energetic external activities for global peace and stability and friendship and solidarity among peoples, holding aloft the banner of independence against imperialism, and thus made gigantic contributions to realizing the cause of human independence.
					
					 The red flag of victory, raised by President Kim Il Sung and hold fast to by Kim Jong Il, is now flying higher in the DPRK.
					
					 The chairperson of the C.C., Party of Communists of Russia said that the world progressives are looking back on Kim Jong Il's noble life, together with the Korean people, on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The secretary of the Committee of the Republic of Buryatia of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation stressed it was a miracle in the world history of politics that Kim Jong Il had reliably defended Korean socialism from the vicious challenges of the imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent great person not only in the 20th century but in the 21st century.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association published the Dec. issue of its bulletin.
					 The bulletin noted in an article titled "Fifth anniversary of the great General Kim Jong Il's demise" that Kim Jong Il passed away on a running train on Dec. 17, 2011, while continuing his forced march for field guidance day and night.
					
					 It said:
					
					 He consolidated the socialist system of Korea by applying the Juche idea, the Songun idea, and performed immortal feats in all fields of social life.
					
					 Socialist Korea, built and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, will as ever emerge victorious.

articles.title: Russian Body Blasts UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
Russian Body Blasts UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK on Dec. 9 issued a statement to condemn the UNSC's adoption of "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 The statement expressed deep concern about the UNSC campaign for putting pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC must know the reason why the DPRK could not but bolster up its nuclear force, it said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is reinforcing its strategic assets in south Korea, thus rendering the situation of the Korean peninsula extremely tense.
					
					 It also seeks to stifle at any cost the DPRK working hard for the wellbeing of its people and the prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Anti-DPRK sanctions will prove counter-productive.
					
					 Intensified sanctions will make the Korean people do their best for bolstering of national strength, united close around their leadership.

articles.title: CC de PTC publica nota informativa sobre la culminacion exitosa de campana de 200 dias
articles.content:
CC de PTC publica nota informativa sobre la culminacion exitosa de campana de 200 dias
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea hizo publica el dia 18 la nota de informacion de que se concluyo con exito el 15 de diciembre la campana de 200 dias, iniciada el primero de junio del ano en curso.
					Los 200 dias fueron la campana de ofensiva sucesiva y vencimiento de obstaculos y la de crear el espiritu de autofortalecimiento y la velocidad de Mallima para defender el espiritu del VII Congreso del PTC y hacer de este ano la era dorada de la Revolucion ampliando y desarrollando los triunfos logrados en la campana de 70 dias, inicia la nota y continua:
					
					La mayor victoria lograda en la campana de 200 dias es que se ha consolidado con firmeza la unidad monolitica entre el partido y las filas de la revolucion, la cual significa el cimiento elemental de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Los heroicos oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea que tomaron firmemente el remedio omnipotente para la defensa de la revolucion y el pueblo crearon los ejemplos de la ejecucion incondicional, de manera que cumplieron con su deber del ejercito revolucionario del partido en encender en todo el pais la llamarada de materializacion de la idea del partido y de defensa de la politica del partido y en intensificar la gran unidad militar-civil.
					
					Los vanguardistas juveniles kimilsungistas-kimjongilistas ostentaron su inteligencia y audacia de la juventud heroica en todos los dominios mas dificiles.
					
					Los obreros heroicos de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, los trabajadores agricolas, los intelectuales y las mujeres demostraron sus rasgos espirituales y morales de sostener con fidelidad e incremento productivo al partido y al lider y de ayudar entre si con el sentimiento fraternal.
					
					En el frente para resarcir los danos en las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte se logro un triunfo milagroso de convertir los malos en la fortuna.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias levantaron una oleada de entrenamiento del tipo del monte Paektu y perfeccionaron mas los preparativos de combate para hacer anicos todos los bastiones de agresion y provocacion en todos los espacios operacionales y defender la seguridad del pais y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Los trabajadores de la industria de defensa nacional lograron sucesivamente los exitos en la prueba de explosion de la ojiva nuclear y en el desarrollo de las armas estrategicas ultramodernas con el estilo coreano.
					
					En la rama de industria cumplieron en 119% el objetivo del producto bruto de la campana de 200 dias y mas de miles de empresas industriales sobrecumplieron con anticipacion sus planes anuales.
					
					En la rama de ciencias y tecnicas desarrollaron por primera vez en la historia del pais el generador electrico de energia eolica con capacidad de 250KW y perfeccionaron la tecnologia de produccion de electrodo necesario al horno electrico UHP, asi como resolvieron muchos problemas cientificos y tecnicos e impulsaron activamente los preparativos para fundar la industria de ciencias sofisticadas.
					
					Se normalizo en el alto nivel la produccion electrica y carbonifera, se elevaron los mayores exitos en las ramas de industria metalurgica y de transporte ferroviario y se levanto un auge en varias ramas de industria basica como la mecanica, la quimica y la de materiales de construccion.
					
					En la agricultura, la fruticultura y la pesqueria se alcanzaron los exitos no vistos en la produccion de cereales,  frutas y pescado.
					
					Fueron inventados y producidos incontables materias primas, materiales y equipos nacionales, impulsada activamente la modernizacion a estilo coreano y elaborados en gran cantidad los productos con marcas coreanas en la industria ligera.
					
					En las zonas septentrionales situadas a la orilla del rio Tuman se aparecieron las avenidas y aldeas felices del socialismo.
					
					En diversas localidades se edificaron las creaciones monumentales de la epoca de Mallima inclusive la primera etapa de la marisma de Honggondo, la primera etapa del canal de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong y la Fabrica de Oxigeno Medicinal y se impulso con rapidez la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong.
					
					Muchas fabricas y empresas dieron a luz a los cumplidores de los planes de dos o tres anos, a los jinetes de Mallima y a los protagonistas de los actos heroicos.
					
					La Universidad Kim Il Sung y mas de 110 universidades de todo el pais hicieron mas eficaces, universales y modernos los contenidos didacticos y realizaron el multifuncionamiento de  las aulas y las salas de experimento.
					
					Se logro un gran avance en la aplicacion del sistema de educacion obligatoria general de 12 anos y se acondicionaron las salas de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas en muchas fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas.
					
					Las futbolistas coreanas alcanzaron de manera sucesiva las dos copas mundiales y se crearon las obras literarias y artisticas con profundo caracter ideo-artistico, entre otras, la cancion "Socialismo que avanza", la novela larga "Tren de campana" como serie del ciclo "Orientacion de Trascendencia Eterna", la funcion musical y coreografica "Autobiografia de la Juventud" y la pelicula de ficcion "Cuento de mi casa".
					
					Gracias al logro de la meta general de la campana de 200 dias, se preparo la garantia firme para conquistar con seguridad la cota de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el Desarrollo de la Economia Nacional.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion internacional por la preservacion de paz en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion internacional por la preservacion de paz en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 15 y 16 en Estocolmo de Suecia la reunion internacional sobre el asunto para preservar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros expertos en la seguridad de varios paises y regiones.

articles.title: Tuvo lugar en RPDC la condecoracion del Estado
articles.content:
Tuvo lugar en RPDC la condecoracion del Estado 
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la ceremonia de condecoracion del Estado a los trabajadores, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los funcionarios, quienes hicieron gran aporte a la glorificacion de este ano como nueva era dorada de la revolucion y a la manifestacion de la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso del pais.
					La Orden Kim Il Sung fue concedida a Jo Pyong Sik y la Orden Kim Jong Il, a Ri Thaek Ho.
					
					El titulo del Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC, la Medalla de Oro (El Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase fueron otorgados a Kang Yong Sok, Jong Il Chol, Jong Chang Su, Pak Kyong, Yun Jae Hyok, Kang Pyong Nam, Ri Chun Gyu y Ra Jong Chol.
					
					El reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung fue conferido a Choe Kil Yong y Pak Kyong Il y el reloj con el nombre del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, a Kim Jong Hyang y Kim Hwa Sik.
					
					Fue otorgado el diploma de honor del Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Jong Un, a Choe Sung Do, Jong Sun Chol, Kye Sung Jin, Kim Su Hyok, Mun Song Sil, Jo Yong Sam, Kim Yun Chol, Jong Ok Im, Kang Won Hui, Pak Yong Baek, Ri Sung Uk, Kim Hak Won, Ji Jong Ho, Kim Tae Song, Jo Hui Chol, Ju Kwang Sik, Song In Chol, Han Mun Song y Ri Su Il y el diploma de honor del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un, a Kim Ki Su y Pong Won.
					
					El Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung fue entregado a Kim Kum Song y el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il, a Kim Song Guk, Kim Jong Ok y Jo Un Suk.
					
					Fue otorgado el titulo de Deportista del Pueblo a Rim Jong Sim y muchos benemeritos recibieron titulos honorificos.
					
					Ri Won Myong y otros 78 recibieron la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de condecoracion del Estado del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae y los funcionarios del ejercito y la sociedad, los militares del EPC y los trabajadores, quienes realizaron meritos sobresalientes en la construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: AFC selecciona a mejores futbolistas de 2016
articles.content:
AFC selecciona a mejores futbolistas de 2016 
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Segun el reciente anuncio de la Asociacion de Futbol de Corea, el jugador del Conjunto Deportivo de Pyongyang, Ri Myong Guk, la jugadora del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de abril, Ri Hae Yon, y la otra del Conjunto Deportivo Sobaeksu, Kim So Hyang, fueron elegidos como mejores futbolistas del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.
					Ri sobresalio en la segunda ronda de eliminatorias del Campeonato de Futbol E-1 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia permitiendo al equipo coreano ocupar el primer lugar y ganar el boleto al campeonato.
					
					El fue el unico portero que no permitio ninguna anotacion en 3 partidos.
					
					Habia sido elegido como mejor futbolista tambien en 2014 y 2015.
					
					Las jugadoras Ri y Kim contribuyeron a la conquista en este ano de 2 Copas Mundiales sub-17 y sub-20 de la FIFA.
					
					 La primera acumulo 6 goles espectaculares durante la Copa Mundial (f) sub-17 y recibio el premio Zapato de Plata.
					
					 La segunda gano el premio Balon de Plata en la Copa Mundial (f) sub-20 por el merito de 4 goles y varias asistencias.

articles.title: Terminada primera etapa de la obra de canal  de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
articles.content:
Terminada primera etapa de la obra de canal  de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
Haeju, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Concluyo la primera etapa de la obra del canal de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Asi se ha formado la red de irrigacion por gravedad en la region occidental del pais que permite el alto y seguro rendimiento de las tierras cultivables en Haeju y los distritos de Pyoksong, Ongjin y Kangryong.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el terreno la ceremonia inaugural del nuevo canal.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Kwak Pom Gi y los funcionarios interesados, los constructores participantes en la obra, asi como los funcionarios y trabajadores de esta provincia.
					
					Se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enviado a los constructores y ayudantes.
